TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WebPartExportMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 控件的属性是可以全部导出、部分导出还是无法导出。

span.span: Specifies whether all, some, or none of a control's properties can be exported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举中的一个值 `WebPartExportMode` 可应用于 属性，以指定可以导出 Web 部件控件中的哪些属性。A value from the `WebPartExportMode` enumeration can be applied to the property to specify which properties from a Web Parts control can be exported. 默认情况下， 不能导出控件的属性，并且会将控件的 属性设置为 `None` 。By default, the properties of a control cannot be exported, and the control's property is set to `None`. 若要为控件启用导出所有属性，请将 值设置为 `All` 。To enable exporting all properties for the control, set the value to `All`. 若要仅导出某些属性，同时禁止导出包含敏感数据的属性，请将属性值设置为 `NonSensitiveData` 。To export only certain properties while preventing the export of properties that contain sensitive data, you set the property value to `NonSensitiveData`. 可以通过属性将属性标记为敏感 。A property can be marked as sensitive through the attribute. > [!NOTE] > 若要为包含 Web 部件控件的 Web 应用程序启用导出功能，请在应用程序的 Web.config 文件中，将特性添加到 `` 部分中的元素 `` ，如以下标记所示：To enable the export feature for a Web application that includes Web Parts controls, in the Web.config file for your application, you must add an attribute to the `` element within the `` section, as in the following markup: > > ```xml > > > ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示属性的用法 。The following example demonstrates the use of the property. 请注意，要使导出代码示例正常运行，你还必须更新 Web.config 文件，如 "[备注](#remarks)" 部分所示。Note that for the export code example to work, you must also update your Web.config file, as indicated in the [Remarks](#remarks) section. 此示例的第一部分包含名为的控件的代码 `TextDisplayWebPart` 。The first part of this example contains the code for a control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 此控件与在类的 "[示例" 部分](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/api/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart#examples)中找到的自定义控件相同 ，不同之处在于它将添加 到属性中， `TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText` 以便可以导出属性。This control is the same as the custom control that is found in the [Examples section](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/api/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart#examples) of the class, except that it adds a to the `TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText` property so the property can be exported. 请注意，属性声明中包含参数的值 `true` `isSensitive` ，这意味着将属性标记为敏感数据以供导出。Note that the attribute declaration includes a value of `true` for the `isSensitive` parameter, meaning that the property is marked as sensitive data for export purposes. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例假定您将源代码编译成一个程序集，将其放在您的 Web 应用程序的 Bin 子文件夹中，并在您的网页中使用指令引用该程序集 `Register` 。This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练，请参阅[演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/yhzc935f(v=vs.100))。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/yhzc935f(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示如何 `TextDisplayWebPart` 在 ASP.NET 网页中引用该控件。The second part of the example shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page. 请注意，在声明性标记中， 属性值设置为 "全部"，这意味着甚至将导出具有敏感值的属性。Note that in the declarative markup, the property value is set to All, meaning that even properties with sensitive values will be exported. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/CS/exportmodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/VB/exportmodevb.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载网页，并在控件的谓词菜单上 ，单击 "导出" 谓词，然后按照说明导出包含控件状态和属性数据的描述文件。Load the Web page in a browser, and on the verbs menu of the control, click the export verb and follow the instructions to export a description file containing the control's state and property data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode All = int32(1)

summary.span: Web 部件控件的所有属性都可以导出。

span.span: All of a Web Parts control's properties can be exported.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode None = int32(0)

summary.span: 无法导出 Web 部件控件的任何属性。

span.span: None of a Web Parts control's properties can be exported.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode NonSensitiveData = int32(2)

summary.span: 仅能导出 Web 部件控件的已定义为非敏感数据的属性。

span.span: Only properties of a Web Parts control that have been defined as non-sensitive can be exported.
